summary: For those who use a gamepad, you can give me your xpadder configuration and I will post the file and the description in the main description for all the people
descriptionHtml:
For those who use gamepad.
You can give me your xpadder configuration and I will post the file and the description in the main description for all the people

First I post my playstation keymap profile. You will see the file.
The controls used for playstation would be the following:
Z = shout
1,2,3,4 + cursors = favorites numbers + move to menu
WASD (left joy) = move to menu + move player
right,left clicks = left,right hands
F = change camera
ctrl = sneak
Q = favourites menu
Left shift = sprint
R = prepare/relax for combat
mouse (right joy) = mouse
select = tab menu
start = escape menu
PD: on PS1PS2PS3.zip file I use the Twin USB converter + PsOne controller. But it's just the profile, you will see the used buttons work


Here is a tutorial for configuring xpadder (you will see much video tutorials on youtube for xpadder):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2JxPjT8uPzw
author: dber43
